We are delighted to inform you about a fantastic opportunity for aspiring researchers. The UniversitÃ  degli Studi "Gabriele d'Annunzio" (Italy) is offering public selection for admission to their PhD programs for the academic year 2024/2025. SportAnalytics is proud to co-fund a #PhD #scholarship on an innovative research topic: ğ—œğ—»ğ˜ƒğ—²ğ˜€ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—´ğ—®ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğ—˜ğ—ºğ—¯ğ—¼ğ—±ğ—¶ğ—²ğ—± ğ——ğ—²ğ—°ğ—¶ğ˜€ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—» ğ— ğ—®ğ—¸ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğ—¶ğ—» ğ——ğ˜†ğ—»ğ—®ğ—ºğ—¶ğ—° ğ—¦ğ—½ğ—¼ğ—¿ğ˜ ğ—˜ğ—»ğ˜ƒğ—¶ğ—¿ğ—¼ğ—»ğ—ºğ—²ğ—»ğ˜ğ˜€. Scholarship Details: Duration: 3 years Application Deadline: 12:00 PM (Italian time) on July 21, 2024. Application Details: https://lnkd.in/d2xAnFzU This is a unique chance to immerse yourself in groundbreaking research and make significant contributions to the field of sports analytics. For additional information and to submit your application, please reach out to the Project Coordinator: Prof. Maurizio Bertollo at maurizio.bertollo@unich.it Embrace this opportunity to advance your academic journey and explore the dynamic world of sports environments. We are excited to welcome your application! #ResearchOpportunity #SportAnalytics #HigherEducation #DecisionMaking
